content: Pattakkaran: Shubaho laabo…\n\t(Pithaavinum Puthranum Parishudhdha Roohaykkum sthuthi.)
Balahinarium paapikalumaya njangalde mel / anugrahavum karunayum / randu lokangalilum / ennumennekkum choriyaappettumarakaname. / Aammeen.

Daivamaaya Karthave! Anashwaramaaya viruninum azhivilatha manavarakkyum njangale yogyarakkename. Aa virunilekku kshanikkappettirikkunna athithikalodukoode ninte nithyamaaya santhoshangalilekku njangaleyum kshanikkename. Avarude koottathilum idayilum ninnukondu njangal ninakkum ninte pithaavinum Parishudhdha Roohaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettumarakaname. Hosh’o...

Aadhimanithijnnare vaazhthiya daivam than bahukrupayaal
Ee daasare vaazhtha - + tte Devaa daya cheytheedaname
Havvaayod Aadamine vaazhthiya daivam than bahukrupayaal
Ee daasare vaazhtha - + tte Devaa daya cheytheedaname
Saarayod Abraamine vaazhthiya daivam than bahukrupayaal
Ee daasare vaazhtha - + tte Devaa daya cheytheedaname
Rafkkayod Ishahakkine vaazhthiya daivam than bahukrupayaal
Ee daasare vaazhtha - + tte Devaa daya cheytheedaname
Raahélodu Yaakko-bine vaazhthiya daivam than bahukrupayaal
Ee daasare vaazhtha - + tte Devaa daya cheytheedaname

Mesanil Yause-ppine vaazhthiya daivam than bahukrupayaal
Ee daasare vaazhtha - + tte Devaa daya cheytheedaname

Pattakkaran: Karthave parasparam bandhitharaayirikkunna ee daasare ninte nalvarangalude aishwaryathaal shreshtharaakkukayum ninte daanangalal santhoshippikkukayum cheyyename. Ninte divya kalpanakalil ninnulla aanandamkondu ivare niraykkename. Pithaavum Puthranum Parishudhdha Roohayumaayullove! Santhoshollaasangalodukoode ivar ninakku sthuthi paadukayum thirusannidhiyil aahlaadikkukayum cheyyumarakaname. Hosh’o...

Modikkatte param Naatha Halleluyya u Halleluyya
Nin shakthiyilum rakshayilum nrupathi

Nallavaram nee mumperavaneeki Halleluyya u Halleluyya
Mahimaavin mudichoodi thalayil

Manavaraaye mel swarggathil
Sabhaye nin kaanthan sthaapichaan
Vaagdhatham pol, swarggamevum
Shulthonanmar Haileyarkko...
Sivarekkaal ninne melaakki.
Pattakkaran: Naam ellavarum prarthichu Karthavinod anugrahavum karunayum yaachikkanam.
Anugrahikkunnavanaaya Karthave / njangalod karuna cheythu / njangale sahaayikkaname.

Sthuthiyum sthothravum prabhayum pukarshayyum idavidathe karettuvaan njangale yogyarakkename.\n\tUndayirunavarum ippozhullavanu ennaennikkum... aviduththae daasaarude kireedangal aasheervadikkapedunna ee samayaththum... Bukool Hoon...
Pattakkaran: Sakala swargiya senakalum ... \n ninakkum ninte pithavinum parishudha Roohaykkum sthuthium sthothravum njangal karettunnu. Hosh’o...

Sundarikalilathi sundari nee jaathikalil - soonu
Nrupathishalomon vimalasabhaye - ninelaalippu
Ninnadharaṅṅal madhuvrushikkunnu
Vasanasugandham - Neesan kusumasamam
Sabhaye sakalavidhamaayum sumukhi - nee kar theendaatthoL
Sleebaye vandippathinaal raajaavaam mashihaa
Halleluyya - Kaakkunnu ninne.

Sabhayodunnenne moonu - kottakal churutthunnu
Vanchakanam dushtaathmaavi - ngullil pookida
Bandhichavaya - annyonyam moonnum
Kottakalidhaayil - sthalamilliv paarthaal
Thaatha suthaamala Roohayaam - ekathvama threetvama
Mahimayezhum manavaatti samam
Halleluyya - u - Halleluyya.

Pattakkaran: Koththine pattannaththil kalyanavirishninaayi ... \n Njangalum ivarum ninte valaththubhaagaththil ninnukondu ninte karunay darshikkum ninakkum ninte pithavinum parishudha Roohaykkum sthuthium sthothravum karettum cheyyumaarakunnu. Hosh’o...

Paulos Shleehadhanyan chol
Ketten - ithe - vam
Ningale njangal ariyichathineethiraayi
Verooruvan vannariyichhaal
Vaanavanenkilumaadhoothan
Thaanelkkum sabhayin shaapam
Palatharupadesangalaho
Paaril mulachuparakkunnu
Daivaththinnupadesham tho-
ttaavasaanippippon dhanyan
Shushrooshakkaar: Parishudhanaya Paulos Shleehaa Ephesosukarkku ezhutthiya lekhanaththil ninnum. Aahaay Barekmor.
Shleehaayude udayavanu sthuthium / namudemeel thante anugrahangalum / ennaekum / undaayirikkatte.

(Ephesians 5:20 - 6:3)\n\t Nammude karthavaaya Yeshu Mashihayaude naamaaththil sarvadhhaaa sarvruththinum vendi pithavaaya daivaththae sthuthikkavin. Mashihayaalulla snehaththaal parasparam keezhppettukaayi cheyvin. StreekaLe namude karthavine ennaprakaaram ningal ninṟu bharththakkante anusareepeen. Enthennu, Mashihā sabhayude thalavum sharīraththinte rakshithavum aakunna prakaaram bharththavum bhāryāyākaayi. Sabhā Mashihāykku keezhppettunna prakaaram thanne bhāryāmārum avaravaru bharththākkaṁmāreḷl avaravaru sakalaththilum keezhppettanam. Purushmaru, Mashihā thante sabhāyāyi snehichappoḷ nīngalum ninte bhāryāmāre snehippīn. Sabhāye jalaththil uLLla snehāṇaṁ koṭṭum vachanaṁ koṭṭum vēṇḍumāṇaṁ śuddhikurayēāṁ kāḷaththumāṇaṁ kaṟṟakūṭāṁ ninṟa sthathvavān thējśvēnāyitthe sabhaykāyi Mashihā svapraāṇane samārppichuḷḷuṁallo. Aṅṅane thanne purushmaru svānta śarīrāṇe ennāpoḷ bhāryāmaru snehikkendathākuṁ. Enthennu, tanne bhāryāyi snehikkunnavan thānethanneyākunnu snehikkunnathu. Āruṁ orikkalum svānta śarīraththē dveshikkunnillallo. Pinnēyō Mashihā sabhāykku veṇḍi ennathu pōṡippikkukaayi athinu veṇḍi śramikkukaayi cheyyunnu. Nāṁ aviduththē sharīraththinte avayavakaḷuṁ māṁsabandhikaḷuṁ aśthisambandhikaḷuṁ aakunnu. Āyaththukondu purushan tanṟe pithāvinēyum māthāvinēyum viṭṭupirinjittu tanṟe bhāryāyāyittūḷṟikkāṇu. Avariruvārum ēkasharīrāyiththīrikkum. Ithoru vaḷiya rahasyamāṇu. Njaan Mashihāyēkkūṟiccūṁ aviduththē sabhāykūṟiccūṁ parayunnu. Aprakāraṁ thanne nīṅṅaḷ oruvaruṟuṟu tanṟe bhāryāyi snehikkendākuṁ. Bhāryāyākaṭṭe svabharththāvine ādarikkukayum vēṇṭu. Makkale nīṅṅaḷ karthāvine ōṟṭu māthā-pitākkāṉmāre anusareepeen. Enthennu, athu neethiāyirikkum. Ninṟe pithāvinēyum māthāvinēyum bahumānikkuka ennuḷḷathu prathijña cheytha prathama kalpanayāyirikkunnu. Aahāy... Barekmor.

Halleluyaa - U - Halleluyaa modikatte param naathaa
Nin shakthiyilum - rakshayilum nrupathi - Halleluyaa

Shushrooshakkaar: Naam adakkaththoduṁ bhayaththoduṁ vanakkaththoduṁ chevikoduthth namude mumbhaake vaayikkappedunna namude karthaveshuMashihayude vishuddha Evangelionile daivaththinte jeevanulla vachanangalude ariyippine kelkkanam.
Aviduththe aathmaavinodu koodae / daivamaaya karthav / njangaleyum / yoghyarakki theerkumaarakattte.
Vannavannum varuvaanirikkunnavannum vaazhtthappettavannakunnu. / Namude rakshaykkaayi thanne ayachchavannu sthuthikalum / naam ellavaryudeyum meele thante anugrahangalkum / ennaekum undaayirikkatte.

Pattakkaran: Ee vachangal samsaarichu kazhinjasheshham Yeshu Galeelaayil ninnum yaathra purappettu Yordan'the marukarayil Yehudhinde athirththiyil ethi. Janasamuhangal addehaththine anugamichu avidevachch avare sukhappettuvichu. Anantharam parikshaartham preeshanmar addehuthonne ezhuthuvannalum oruththanu thannude bharyayode pirichuviduvaan nyaayamundoo enn chodhichu. Addeh avarodu uththaram paranju. Aadiyil srishtikarththavum aanum pennumayi avare srishtichu ennaththukondu purushan thante pithavineyum maathavineyum viṭṭupirinjhu bhāryayode cheyyanirikkum. Avariruvārum oru sharīramākunnu. Athukondu Daivam samyojippichchaththine manushyan verparikkaaruthu. Avar addehuthonne anghanehilāyi mochana patram koduththavidaanavidaanashakkorupadannu chothichu. Addeh avarodu paranju. Mosha ningalude hrudayakāṭhinyam nimiththamaāyi bhāryāmarayi pirichuvīṭṭavān ningale anuvadichu. Ennal aadiyil anganeyāyi illāyi. Njan ningalodu parayunnu. Vyabhichara kuttam kondallāte swabhaaryaye upakṛṣṭhikkunnavanu cheyyunnathu vyabhicharamaanu. Upakṛṣṭhikkappettaavalayi vyabhicharamthāne. Shishyangal addehuthonne bhāryābharththākkāṟu parasparasthiti ee vidhāṁ kutṭakaramenkil vivāham cheyyunnathu nallathallāo ennupārāyichu. Addeh paranju, varam labhichavanu allāte ellāvarkkum ee vachanaththil shaktaralla. Enthukondu, thangalude mātavinte udaraththil ninnuthanne shaṇḍanmarāyi janichchittulla shaṇḍanmaruṇṭu. Manushyarāal shaṇḍanmarākappetta shaṇḍanmarumundu. Swargaraajyānimiththama thāngale shandhmarākkithiruththittulla shanḍanmaruṇṭu. Shakthanaakuvān kazhiyunnavanu shakthanaakatte ennu thaan kalpicharulichu cheythu.\n\tNingalekkellavarkum sampreeti undaayirikkatte.

Vandya Sleebatharuvinmel
Neethimaharaviyam ninne
Nirmalayam sabha kandappol
Ampili thulyam kramamayinini
Takhiladhipanam nin pragathyathe
Vidhipol bhangya ghoshichu
\tPithavinteyum Puthranteyum Parishuddha Roohayudeyum Namathil ee kireedangalum iva vaykappedunna shirassukalum enneneekkum aasheervadichu koodhamakkappettirikkunnu.

Vaneenudayon kayyal
Makudam ghoshamira - ngunnu
Manavalaney Aacharyan
Anikim makudam ramyam
Mashihha nrupanaal rachitham makudam paaram ruchiram
Pattakkaran : Karthavu ninne neethiyin kireedam dharippikkayum akshayamaaya alankaarangalaal alankarikayum shathruvinte sakala shakthikkum ethiraayi ajyayamaaya aayudham dharippikkayum cheyyatte.

Vaneenudayon kayyaal
Makudam ghoshamira - ngunnu
Manavattiye aa - chaaryan
Anikkyum makudam ramyam
Janam : Vaidhikashemmashanmarukkanmpaalimpam nalka\n Mudiyal manavalanum manavarayaal manavattikkum
Janam : Mahithaacharya nmaaral dampathikalkkeekiduvaan\nMashihha nrupanaal rachitham makudam paaram ruchiram
Janam : Manavalanthan - makudam thirumulmudiyaodu sadrishyam,\nManavattiyude makudam sathimaar mudiyaodu sadrishyam.

Pattakkaran : (Manavattiyude shirassil kireedam dharippichukondu)\nNeethiyin kireedavum akshayabhangiyulla alankaarangalum Karthavu ninne dharippikkatte. Pithaavinum Puthranum Parishuddhaathmaavinum sthuthi karetikkondu Aayushkkaalam muzhuvanum santhoshikkukaana ninakkidayaavukayum cheyyatte. Hosho...
(India-yile puraathanamaaya aachaaramanusarichu manavattiyude kazhuthil kurishu kettunnu.)

Sleebo oso dshano
Sleebo neeshodsookkuso
Sleebo db'efikkinan
Bekoolan meshtab'hareenan

Shubhachihnam thaan sleeba
Vijayakkodi thaan sleeba
Namme rakshicheetum
Sleebayil pukazhunnu naam

Vinayam maanam pathibhakthi En priya thannude moodupadam
Rafkkaayathinaalaavruthayaay - moodanamathupol manavatti

Pattakkāran : Manushyajeevithathil santhoshikkunnavanāya Karttāv ningaḷuṭe jeevithathil preethippettu ningaḷuṭe bandhathe anugrahikkumāṟākatte. Swarggeeya maṇavāḷanāya Mashihā yathārthamayāya thante maṇavāḷathwaththāl ningaḷuṭe maṇavāḷathwaththinu mudrayiṭatte. Mashihā thante sabhayil ennappolē ningaḷ annyōnyaṁ santhoshikkumāṟākatte. Karuṇayulla valaththukai vannu ningaḷil āvasichchu ella upadravangalil ninnum ningaḷe kāththukoḷḷatte. Samādhāna doothan ningaḷoṭukoodi irunnu ākalkkarusāyude vanchanayil ninnum ningaḷe samrakshikkumāṟākatte. Maranakarāmāya asooyayil ninnum Daivam ningaḷe kāththukoḷḷukayum, ningaḷe parasparaṁ santhōshippikkukayum, ningaḷil ninnum duḥkhangale neekki kaḷayukayum cheyyatte. Abraham Isahākilum, Isahāk Yākōbilum Yākōb Yauseppilum santhōshichchaprakāram ningaḷkkum santhōshikkennathin uththama santhānangale Karttāv ningaḷkk tharaṇamāṟākatte. Ningal vardhichchu peruki bhoomiyil nirayuvin ennu paṟaññu koṇṭu Daivam Nōhinum makkaḷkumāyi nalkiya anugrahavum ningaḷil vasikkatte. Ākāshaththu ninnum panimaññum bhoomi ulppādippikkunna sarvva salphalangalum Daivam ningaḷkk nalkatte. Ninṟe pithāvinde Daivam ninne sahāyikkum ennu paṟaññu koṇṭu Yākōb thante puthranāya Yauseppinu nalkiyathāya anugraham ningaḷil vasikkatte. Daivatte snēhikkukayum aviyuduthe ishttam ācharykkukayum cheythittulla varuṭe anugraham ningaḷilum pattakkārude kaikalaāl ningaḷuṭe thalayil innu vaykkappettaṭāya kirīṭaṅṅaḷilum vasikkumāṟākatte. Karttāvint̠e nāmaṁ ningaḷumeel viḷikkappettaṭu koṇṭellā jāthikaḷum santhōshichchu mahathwam pāṭumāṟākatte. Aishwaryangal koṇṭum sampādyangal koṇṭum sarvvavidha saubhāgyangal koṇṭum Daivam ningaḷe sampannarākukayum ā pāpiniyoṭennuṟeṅṅu ningaḷuṭe kaṭakaṅṅaḷum pāpangaḷum kshamikkukayum cheyyatte. Valaththubhāgaththē kaḷḷanepōlē ningaḷum swarggarājyaththinu avakāshikaḷāyi bhavikkatte. Nāmeḷḷāvaruṭeyum marichchu poyavar pāpaparihāram prāpikkukayum cheyyatte. Mesanilninnu koṭṭikkoṇṭupōnna maṇavāṭṭiyōṭu uḍampadi cheyyuvānāyi Sīnayi malayil iraṅṅivanna ā mahōnnathan ningaḷeyum nammuṭe ee sangham muzhuvaneeyum anugrahikkumāṟākatte. Namukku pithāvinuṁ puthranum Parisud'dha Roohāykkum sthuthi karēṭṭām. Hōśō...

Edenthottam nattone
Neeyaanen yuva manavaalan
Nin thottatheen penkaay
Veeshideeduka kulir thennal

Sathyamanaala neethijnyaa
Naatha! njan nin manavaatti
Neeyaanen thanalum thaangum
Cheyyanamennoadu kaarunyam

Sleebaayaalavakaasha dhanam
Mudrithamaakki peedakalal
Adimavidarththi swargathil
Panthiyil enne neeyetti

Naalum maasavum aandum njan
Paapappazh-irulil pokki
Nin jeevadhwani kettappol
Kannu thelinjaananandicchen

Karthaave ninnaardhratha nirayum vaathil thurannii
Praarththana kettittaatmaakkalilanpundaakename

Daivaathmajane dampathikaleyum thalayil choodum
Makudangaleyum valathukarathaal vaazhththeedename +

Naamam chonnee dampathikalkkaay varamekename +
Thejo lokaththivarude kaalam shubhamaakename

Dhanyathayaarnoal parishuddhanmaar thal praarththanayaal
Vaazhththaname + ee jananivahattayennennekkum

Nin sthuthi paadaan kinnaramenthi sthothram cheyvaan
En karthaave ivarude vaaykkale vaazhththeedename +

Sarvvam kettittabhyarththanaye kaikkoalvoane
Praarththana kettittaatmaakkalmeel krupa cheyyename

Pattakkaaran : Vaathsalya sahodaranmare, naamellaavrum daivabhavanaththil sannihitharaayirikkunna ee sandarbaththil, vishvaasikale prabodhikkukayum, nammuthe munpil nilkkunna ivar sathyaththilum neethiyilum salpravruththikalilum thalpararum nalla kaaryangalil utsaahikalum aayirikkendathennu urappaayi kalppikkukayum cheyyuka enn parambaryam namukkundu. Ith vishuddha pithaakkanmaaril ninn naam praapichittullathum bahumaanayaraaya poorvvikanmaar namme bharamelpichittullathumaanu. Makkale, ippol ningal daivasannidhiyilum, nammuthe Karthaaveshumashihaayude simhaasanamaaya jeevameshayudeyum, sleebaayudeyum vedippulla evanjeliyontheyum, ee janakkoottattinteyum munpaakaayanu nilkkunnathennu prathekam shraddhippeen. Hridayavichaarangal ariyunnavante sannidhiyilaakunnu, ariyaaththavante munpaakaayalla ningal nilkkunnath. Itha ee samayam njan ningale parasparam bharamelppikkunnu.

Enikkum ningalkkumidayil daivam madhyasthanaayirikkatte. Niyama virudhdhamaayi ningal cheyyunna sakalathilum njan niraparaadhiyayirikkum. Pattakkaarilum shemmaashanmaarilum, vishvaasikalaya janathilum manavaalanilum manavattiilum, kshanikkappettavarilum kshanikchavariilum daivathinte anugrahangalum karunayum vannu samruddhiyaayi aavasikkatte. Anugrehithaya maathavum daivajananiyumaaya vishuddha kanyakamariyamintem, nammude karthaavine snehikkukayum avittutthe kalpannakal aacharikukayum cheyythittullaavaraya sarva vishuddhanmaarudeyum praarthanakalal karthaaveshumashihaayude valathukai ennenekkum ningalil aavasikkumaarakatte.

\tVeendum vishvaasikale, ee kalpannakal ningalkkellavarkkumaayittakunnu enn arinjukoalveen. Ningalil oro oruthanum avanavante bhaaryayodulla bandham enganeyaayirikkanamenna nallavannam shraddhippeen. Ival swanthamaalukale vedinj ivalue bharthavinoad samyojippikkappettirikkunnu. Aakaayal avan avale preethippikkukayum avalod dayavullavanayirikkukayum venam. Avan nagnanaayirunnalum avalkk dharippaan nalkanam. Thante praananepole aval avanoad varththikkanam. Avan vishannirunnalum avalkk bhakshanam nalkanam. Avan daahichirunnalum avalkk kudippaan nalkanam. Avalum nyaayamaya prakaaram avante paricharana nirvvahikkan kadappeduthavalaakunnu. Ella kaaryangalilum snehathodum premathodum koodi aval avante adukkal varththikkanam. Nammude karthaaveshumashihaayude krupa njangalilum ningalilum ennekkeum undaayirikkatte.

Janam : Ninte thirunaamam parishuddhamaakkappetteaname. / Ninte raajyam vareaname. / Ninte thiruvishhtam swarggatthileppole bhoomiyilum aakeaname. / Njangalkkaavashyamulla appam innnum njangalkku tharaname. / Njangalde kadakkaaroadu njangal kshamichathupole / njangalde kadangalum paapangalum njangalodu kshamikkaneame. Pareekshyaillekku njangale praveshippikkaaruthe. / Pinnemyo dushhtanil ninnum njangale rakshichukollaname. / Enthukaonndennaal raajyavum shakthiyum mahathvavum / ennekkeum ninakkullathaakunnu. Aammeen.
Pattakkaaran : Krupa niranja Mariyame ninakku samaadhaanam.

Janam : Nammude karthaavu ninnoadekke. / Sthreekalil nee vaazhtthappettavalakunnu. / Ninte udaraphalamaaya / nammude karthaaveshumashihaa vaazhtthappettavanakunnu. Shuddhamulla kanyaka marta - Mariyame / Thampuraante amme / Paapikalaya njangalkkvendhi / ippozhum eppozhum / njangalde maranasamayaththum / daivamthampuraanod abekshichukollaname. Aammeen.
Shushrooshakkaaran : Vandhya pithaavinte praarththana naam ettuchollanam.

Ninnaal sthuthiyodu raajamakal haa-haa
Nin valamaay raajabhaaminiyum
Ninnazhakarachan mohippaan haa - haa
Nin janamorkaaykka pithrugrihavyum

Bhaktharpukazchaa bhaajaname!
Ninniludichchoreka suthan
Thrikkaral njangalilalivaan than
Pakkalapekshayanaykkenam

Moraaneesho kurishshum nin
Maathrujanaththin praarththanayum
Adikaleyum nin kopaththin
Vadikaleyum maaychcheedanam.

Nayavaan pana pole thalirththidume - haa…
Valarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol
Vriddhathayilumavar thalirittu thazhachidume haa...
Varddhikkumavarkku thushti pushtikalum.

Orupolingum (Maarthomma)
Unde melum ninnormma
Uthakaname nin praarththana nin
Ormmaye bahumaanichchorkaay.

Bhaagyam nibiyarkkum - bhaagyam shleeharkkum
Bhaagyam sahadekarkkum - punarutthana dine

Mashihhaaye kaanmaan kaamkshichchoru sahader
Vaalal chirakukal poondunnathapadameri

Parishuddhanmaare! Ningal
Praarththippeen karthaavodaaay
Adikaleyum thankopaththin
Vadikaleyum maayichcheedaan
